title: 念奴娇赤壁怀古
desc:
{"ops":[{"insert":"《念奴娇 赤壁怀古》"},{"attributes":{"header":2},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"大江东去，浪淘尽，千古风流人物。"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"故垒西边，人道是，三国周郎赤壁。"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"乱石穿空，惊涛拍岸，卷起千堆雪。"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"江山如画，一时多少豪杰。"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"遥想公瑾当年，小乔初嫁了，雄姿英发。"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"羽扇纶巾，谈笑间，樯橹灰飞烟灭。(樯橹 一作：强掳)"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"故国神游，多情应笑我，早生华发。"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"#fffaf0"},"insert":"人生如梦，一尊还酹江月。(人生 一作：人间；尊 通：樽)"},{"insert":"
"}]}
